snippet.title: Hotline Miami Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Hotline Miami Launch Trailer. Join us on Facebook & Twitter http://facebook.com/GameNewsOfficial & http://twitter.com/gamenewstrailer. Hotline Miami combines intense action with stylised visuals and a driving soundtrack !

Hotline Miami Launch Trailer. The game is now available to download for PC. Subscribe now to get the latest game teasers, gameplay trailers, videogame walkthrough and ingame videos !
